name: 李宜桓
objective:
本課程分為三大重點：(1) 製程涵蓋：半導體基礎原理、晶圓製造、加熱製程、蝕刻製程、化學氣相沉積、金屬化製程、製程整合技術。(2) 分析涵蓋：晶相結構分析、奈米 3D 顯微形貌表面形態分析、原子力顯微鏡。(3) 業界講師共同授課並分享產業為來發展趨勢。
The course is divided into three main points: (1) The fabrication: basic principles of semiconductor, wafer manufacturing, heating process, etching process, chemical vapor deposition, metallization process, and process integration technology. (2) Analysis: crystal structure analysis, nano 3D micro-topography and surface morphology analysis, atomic force microscope. (3) Industry lecturers teach and share industry trends in the future.
schedule:
1. (1st week)            導論 
2. (2nd and 3rd weeks)     半導體分子材料 - 1 
3. (4th and 5th weeks)     半導體分子材料 - 2 
4. (6th and 7th weeks)     半導體製程與應用 - 1 
5. (8th week)                   半導體製程與應用 - 2

(9th week)  Mid-term Exam 

7. (10th and 11th week)    分析技術與應用 - 1 
8. (12th and 13th weeks)   分析技術與應用 - 2 
9. (14th week)           業界實務講習
10. (15th week)          業界實務講習
11. (16th week)          業界實務講習
12 (17th week)          業界實務講習

(18th week)  Final Exam
scorePolicy:
期中考 30%
期末考 40%
出席與作業成績 30%
materials:
1.　　半導體製造技術與管理 (簡富；清華大學出版)
2.　　Handbook of Microscopy for Nanotechnology (N. Yao and Z. L. Wang; KLUWER ACADEMIC PUBLISHERS)
